General.Name: HBIS Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, processing, selling, and servicing of mineral products in Asia, Africa, Europe, and the Americas. It offers copper products, and iron and vermiculite ore products. The company was formerly known as XuanHua Construction Machinery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. in December 2019. HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.
General.Address: No. 385, Sports South Street, Shijiazhuang, China, 050023
